1:
Praise Yahweh.\q I will give thanks to Yahweh with my whole heart
\q in the assembly of the upright, in their gathering.
\q
2:
The works of Yahweh are great,\q eagerly awaited by all those who desire them.
\q
3:
His work is majestic and glorious,\q and his righteousness endures forever.


\q
4:
He does wonderful things that will be remembered;\q Yahweh is gracious and merciful.
\q
5:
He gives food to his faithful followers.\q He will always call to mind his covenant.
\q
6:
He showed his powerful works to his people\q in giving them the inheritance of the nations.


\q
7:
The works of his hands are trustworthy and just;\q all his instructions are reliable.
\q
8:
They are established forever,\q to be observed faithfully and properly.
\q
10:
To honor Yahweh is the beginning of wisdom;\q those who carry out his instructions have good understanding.
\q His praise endures forever.
